item.title: CVE-2022-2052|2024-08-03T00:24:44.261Z -- trumpf%20werkzeugmaschinen%20se%20%2B%20co.%20kg -- trutops%20monitor
item.description: Multiple Trumpf Products in multiple versions use default privileged Windows users and passwords. An adversary may use these accounts to remotely gain full access to the system.
